item.title: With US tariffs looming, should YOU invest in gold?
item.author: dailymail.co.uk
item.description:
- Bullion traditionally seen as safe haven in a troubled period of history - Central banks also buying, rather than commit funds to the dollar - Another spur to gold's popularity is apprehension about mood of stock market
The price of gold has been hitting record highs - for which Donald Trump is ...
